overview: Kannan Narayan, has over one and half decades experience in funding, investing, incubating and starting small industry. His last assignment was with Polaris Software Lab. Ltd as a Vice President; handling M&A’s, divestitures, incubations as well as internal process monitoring. He also incubated a technology company, as an interim CEO, in a telecom software product development start-up, a Joint Venture of Polaris and the TeNet Group of IIT Madras. Currently Kannan advises startups on scale-up and VC’s in value investing.
